name: Code E.D.
description:
"Out in the deep space of a faraway galaxy, the Exploratory Databot known as E.D. has just discovered a new habitable planet for humankind. Who knows what surprises lay ahead on this remote sandy planet? Unexpectedly while landing, E.D. gets a shock to its motherboard wiping out all its programs. It's up to you to program E.D. to navigate the terrain of this strange new world. This mission is now in your hands!"

Play to Code. Code to Play.

Featuring Lua, one of the most popular game scripting languages in the world, the Code E.D. editor is designed with real-time code discovery and auto-completion, quick help, and auto code snippets to help you learn to code your way out of brain teasing puzzles like a pro. Our sleek real-time code debugger with single step function, breakpoints and local variables tracking will help you keep your eyes on the code at every turn and every step of the way.
